mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.menu_name AS menuName, t1.menu_code AS menuCode, t1.menu_type AS menuType, t1.menu_parent_id AS menuParentId, t1.remark, t1.isvalid, t1.ctime, t1.creater, t1.mtime, t1.updater, CASE WHEN t2.role_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isAssigned FROM sys_menu t1 LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu t2 ON t2.isvalid = 1 AND t1.id = t2.menu_id AND t2.role_id = #{roleId} WHERE t1.isvalid = 1

INSERT INTO sys_role_menu(menu_id, role_id, remark, isvalid, ctime, creater, mtime, updater) VALUES
(#{item.menuId}, #{item.roleId}, #{item.remark}, 1, now(), #{item.creater}, now(), #{item.updater})
